require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'meta_h_responsive_simplified','handlers',['handlers','tablet/tablet']);
/*jshint nonew: false */
/*jshint unused:false */
define(["widget", "commerce/offerclick", "responsive/text-resizer"],
  (function(widget, offerclick, resizer) {
  //shared state between all instances of this widget.
  //defining it this way lets us pick it up in tablet/tablet.js
  widget._shared = this;
  var _shared = this;
  
  var commerceElem = widget.element.querySelector(".comblock");
  var locId = Number((commerceElem && commerceElem.getAttribute("data-locationId")) || "0");
  var listPos = Number((commerceElem && commerceElem.getAttribute("data-listPos")) || "0");

  function clickOffer(event, elem) {
    var token = elem.getAttribute("data-clickToken");
    if (token) {
      offerclick.clickEvent(event, elem, token);
    }
  }
  resizer.init(widget.element);

  //If we already have an overlay open in our slot, but it's for the wrong location ID, then close/destroy it  
  if (_shared.dropDown && _shared.dropDownListPos == listPos && _shared.dropDownLocId != locId) {
    _shared.dropDown.destroy();
    _shared.dropDown=null;
  }
  
  return {
    clickOffer: clickOffer
  };
}).bind({}));
});if (require) {require(['ta/rollupAmdShim'], function(rollupAmdShim) { rollupAmdShim.install([], ["page-model"]); });
}
else {if (window.ta&&ta.rollupAmdShim) {ta.rollupAmdShim.install([],["page-model"]);}
}require(['ta/prwidgets'], function(widgets) {
var define = widgets.define.bind(widgets,'meta_h_responsive_simplified','tablet/tablet',['handlers','tablet/tablet']);
define([
    'widget',
    'page-model',
    'api-mod',
    'overlays/Overlay',
    'overlays/position',
    'overlays/styles/tooltip',
    'overlays/styles/popover',
    'overlays/options/closeOnMouseAway',
    'overlays/options/closeOnSourceClick',
    'overlays/options/closeOnDocClick',
    'overlays/options/autoReposition',
    'overlays/options/maxWidth',
    'overlays/options/fade',
    'overlays/options/ajax'
], function(
    widget,
    pageModel,
    api,
    Overlay,
    Position,
    Tooltip,
    Popover,
    CloseOnMouseAway,
    CloseOnSourceClick,
    CloseOnDocClick,
    AutoReposition,
    maxWidth,
    Fade,
    Ajax
) {
  var _shared=widget._shared; //handlers.js sets this up
  var _overlayComponent;

  function strikeThroughOverlay(event, source){
    if ( !_overlayComponent) {
      var overlayContent = source && source.querySelector(".overlay_contents");
      if(overlayContent) {
        _overlayComponent = new Overlay(source, [
          Tooltip(source, 'above', "dark", overlayContent.innerHTML),
          Position.above(),
          maxWidth(200),
          CloseOnMouseAway,
          Fade(Fade.SHORT, true, true)
        ]);
      }
    }
    if(_overlayComponent){
      _overlayComponent.show();
    }
  }
  
  function dropDown(event, elmt, locId, listPos, pageOffset, ttPlc) {

    var isCloseClick = false;
    locId = Number(locId);
    listPos = Number(listPos);
    pageOffset = Number(pageOffset);
    
    if (_shared.dropDown) {
      //one already exists
      isCloseClick = _shared.dropDown.isOpen() && _shared.dropDownLocId == locId && _shared.dropDownListPos == listPos;
      _shared.dropDown.destroy();
      _shared.dropDown=null;
    }
    if (isCloseClick) {
      return false;
    }
    
    var url =  "/OverlayWidgetAjax?Mode=HOTELS_VIEW_ALL_OFFERS&metaReferer=" + encodeURIComponent(pageModel.session.pageServlet);

    var ajaxOptions={
      sendTravelInfo: true,
      reqParams: { locationId: String(locId), listPos: String(listPos+pageOffset), ttPlc: ttPlc },
      inlineResourceId: 'HOTELS_VIEW_ALL_OFFERS',
      isWidget: true
    };
    
    var mixins=[
      Popover(elmt, "below", "light no_x small"),
      Position.below(),
      CloseOnSourceClick,
      AutoReposition,
      CloseOnDocClick,
      Ajax(url, ajaxOptions),
    ];
    var overlay = new Overlay(elmt, mixins);
    _shared.dropDown = overlay;
    _shared.dropDownLocId = locId;
    _shared.dropDownListPos = listPos;
    overlay.show();
    return false;
  }
  
  function closeDropdown() {
    if (_shared.dropDown) {
      _shared.dropDown.destroy();
      _shared.dropDown=null;
    }
  }
  

  if (!_shared.tabletInitDone) {
    _shared.tabletInitDone = true;
    api.addEvent(document.body, "closeDropdown", closeDropdown);
  }

  return {
    strikeThroughOverlay : strikeThroughOverlay,
    dropDown: dropDown
  };
});
});require(['ta/p13n/placements','ta/page','$prp/background_update_dates/handlers'], function(placements, impl) {
window.ta.plc_background_update_dates_handlers = placements.load('background_update_dates','handlers.js', { 'name': 'background_update_dates', 'id': 'taplc_background_update_dates', 'location_id': 147249, 'servletClass': 'com.TripResearch.servlet.hotels.HotelsDesktopServlet', 'servletName': 'Hotels', 'params': {}, 'data': {}});});

define('maps/v3/carouselController', ['babel/babel-helpers'], function (babelHelpers) {
'use strict';
var _carousels = new Map();
var _carouselsPromiseCache = new Map();
function _getCarouselCacheEntry(mapInstance) {
var entry = _carouselsPromiseCache.get(mapInstance);
if (!entry) {
entry = {};
entry.promise = new Promise(function (resolve) {
entry.resolve = resolve;
});
_carouselsPromiseCache.set(mapInstance, entry);
}
return entry;
}
function _getCarouselInstance(mapInstance) {
return _carousels.get(mapInstance);
}
return {
waitForCarousel: function waitForCarousel(mapInstance) {
return _getCarouselCacheEntry(mapInstance).promise;
},
registerCarousel: function registerCarousel(mapInstance, carouselInstance) {
_carousels.set(mapInstance, carouselInstance);
_getCarouselCacheEntry(mapInstance).resolve(carouselInstance);
return _getCarouselInstance(mapInstance);
},
restartCarouselController: function restartCarouselController(mapInstance) {
var carouselInstance = _getCarouselInstance(mapInstance);
if (carouselInstance) {
carouselInstance.clear();
}
},
finishCardInitialization: function finishCardInitialization(mapInstance) {
var carouselInstance = _getCarouselInstance(mapInstance);
if (carouselInstance) {
carouselInstance.finishCardInitialization();
}
}
};
});

}
